traits.name: Charge
entries: If the sheep moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The sheep has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition prone}.
